name: Emotional Ties
description:
In Emotional Ties play as ace psychic investigator David Coyle as he is called to solve the murder of a groom at his own wedding. Use your psychic talents to pry information out of suspects and get to the bottom of this film noir style mystery.

Emotional Ties is a short visual novel with light puzzle aspects. It is about 1,200 words long and will take 30-40 minutes to play through all 5 chapters. I really hope you enjoy playing.

Icon Art from: The Noun Project

Music from: FesliyanStudios.com

Sound Effects from: Freesound.org, Kenney.nl, Elements.Envato.com

Special thanks to my wonderful wife for editing the script.
